text: 'What a frightful event!' he wrote. 'I tremblel What infatuation! Personally I am indifferent, but I really tremble for my country! I may be mistaken, Itho' [ cannot but fear that the exasperation of the People will be s0 great at the return of Ultratoryism, that the Commons House upon a dissolution, which must be had, will be a mass of Radicalism, & then God knows what may happen .
